knimeNode.name: Model Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Loads previously estimated primary or secondary models from a database

fullDescription.intro: Loads primary or secondary models together with previously estimated parameter values from a database. This can either be the internal database or any HSQL database with the appropriate data structure.
fullDescription.option:
By default the internal database is accessed. This internal database can be accessed and edited by clicking "PmmLab" -> "Open DB Gui...".
In order to use an external database, check the box and choose another HSQL database. If necessary, a login and a password can also be entered. Please note: In order to be able to read the stored data the database should be structured in the same way as the internal database.
Load either estimated primary or secondary models.
Check the box and choose one or more models by klicking the listed names.
Filter the fitted models either by RMS or by R squared by entering a value into the textbox.
Check the box and enter the name of an organism.
Check the box and enter the name of a matrix.
